name: 2.3.0 - Spell of Resurrection
body:
This is the first release since quite a while and under new the new maintainer @poelzi 
Not only does the release fix many outstanding issues, it also contains quite a few additions.

## Whats new
* nix flake support
* support for tunnel commands
* support for batchSizeLimit
* -onepass option
* crontab support
* support relative executable paths

## What's Changed
* Fix typo: width => with by @msabramo in https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/pull/380
* default.collect: Print target by @msabramo in https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/pull/379
* Fix typo: Exlcusions => Exclusions by @msabramo in https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/pull/378
* Updated lbash.lua and lrsync.lau to remove the equals (=) by @mralexjuarez in https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/pull/398
* fix: direct mode allows injecting unauthorized filesystem operations by @wodny in https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/pull/349
* config file url by @gsouf in https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/pull/459
* Add example config for syncing with an AWS S3 bucket by @danielkza in https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/pull/463
* Fix for non-versioned lua not being searched in Cmake by @yokogawa-k in https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/pull/500
* Enable ssh._extra args by @taylor-s-dean in https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/pull/583
* Remove /System/Volumes/Data from fsevent paths on macOS by @ajdavis in https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/pull/615
* version format in lua.h changed by @j1cken in https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/pull/568
* add -onepass option, allowing exit after initial sync by @cleary in https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/pull/541
* Expose rsync's copy_unsafe_links by @rotu in https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/pull/567
* Fixed typo at readme.md by @schneiderl in https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/pull/538
* allow deleting excluded files with rsync by @tomjnixon in https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/pull/595
* fix error - bad binary format (version mismatch) by @CoolTuxNet in https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/pull/656

## New Contributors
* @msabramo made their first contribution in https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/pull/380
* @mralexjuarez made their first contribution in https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/pull/398
* @wodny made their first contribution in https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/pull/349
* @gsouf made their first contribution in https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/pull/459
* @danielkza made their first contribution in https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/pull/463
* @yokogawa-k made their first contribution in https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/pull/500
* @taylor-s-dean made their first contribution in https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/pull/583
* @ajdavis made their first contribution in https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/pull/615
* @j1cken made their first contribution in https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/pull/568
* @cleary made their first contribution in https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/pull/541
* @rotu made their first contribution in https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/pull/567
* @schneiderl made their first contribution in https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/pull/538
* @tomjnixon made their first contribution in https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/pull/595
* @CoolTuxNet made their first contribution in https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/pull/656

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lsyncd/lsyncd/commits/release-2.3.0
